mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE UI_student_no = #{student_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (UI_student_no, UI_name, UI_birth, UI_email, UI_phone_no, UI_pw, UI_group, UI_role) VALUES ( ${user.UI_student_no}, TO_BASE64(AES_ENCRYPT('${user.UI_name}', '${encryptionKey}')), TO_BASE64(AES_ENCRYPT('${user.UI_birth}', '${encryptionKey}')), TO_BASE64(AES_ENCRYPT('${user.UI_email}', '${encryptionKey}')), TO_BASE64(AES_ENCRYPT('${user.UI_phone_no}', '${encryptionKey}')), TO_BASE64(AES_ENCRYPT('${user.UI_pw}', '${encryptionKey}')), '${user.UI_group}', 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT AES_DECRYPT(FROM_BASE64(UI_pw), '${encryptionKey}') FROM USER_INFO WHERE UI_student_no = #{student_no}
